term.title: amphiprotic (solvent)

item.text: Self-ionizing solvent possessing both characteristics of Brønsted acids and bases, for example H2O and CH3OH, in contrast to aprotic solvent.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 1077. 'Glossary of terms used in physical organic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 1083 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466051077)
